author: ranket
title: Product Exhibition from Shikoku
description: In japan, there is no use case of ADA for shopping. On the other hand, Japan local area want to make new appeal method for their product.

author: ranket
title: On line local Area shopping by ADA
description: The use case  for non Crypto citizens is important.  For understanding Cardano worth, we have to emphasize the benefit from Cardano Project.

author: ranket
title: Application contest for students
description: There is quite small number of application product which use ADA or Cardano Native Asset. The new application with ADA pay is important.

author: ranket
title: PAB promotion in Japan
description: Plutus the fundamental program language is not so popular especially in Japan. It is only few method to learn Plutus and hard to develop.

author: fhilip.k
title: Japanese Voter Survey - AIM
description: Japan-specific information about how voters interact with Catalyst is not well understood, focus is needed to ensure engagement of voters.

author: felixweber
title: Japanese Ambassadors & Catalyst
description: The japanese Community needs a Cardano Experts group which helps to onboard japanese community projects into Catalyst

author: smilerosepool
title: Creating a Bilingual Website Hub
description: There are not enough websites directly connecting the English and Japanese speaking Cardano communities with needed information and links.

author: felixweber
title: Eastern Town Hall & Japan
description: The Japanese Community needs an fast and safe onboarding experience into Project Catalyst.

author: jtrube
title: Tokyo Cardano Summit
description: Japanese interest in crypto and blockchain technology is growing, but many still do not actively invest or participate in any communities.

author: raz
title: Sustainability Hub for Japan
description: Story sharing from impactful projects representing the Japanese community, bridged into other languages is lacking in the Cardano ecosystem.

author: thhddnordr
title: Cardano NFT Art Festival
description: There are language and cultural gaps to adopting Cardano. The ++best way to bridge++ cultural and language barriers is through ++creating NFT art.++
